issue.title: Use order layout in backend, to have a full view of orders
issue.body:
**Original author :** Blatti Yves

We have a common layout for order, validation and request.
We should reuse it in backend.

This is the current backend order view:
!current_backend_order_view.png!

This enhancement would add:
* access to perimeter (view + download)
* view user details
* view third party
* view third party
* view properties
* view pricing

**Fixed versions :** 4.4.0

comments.body:
**Original author :** Van Hoecke Hélène 

TC has accepted this enhancement.
